Hello Mostapha and thank for the reply:



2. Ok great. I will try that out 



3. I just started setting up the experiment and developing a agent based system in java using iGEO library for that. We will soon publish a paper presenting the framework and  hope to have some interesting results soon. For now, I am using annual simulation, for specific time zones that relate to the function of the sapce(i.e.  office:9-5) and measure the continuous daylight autonomy and the useful daylight illuminance of the space



Ps: Would be great meet here in LA if you are visiting. You are wellcome to come and visit at USC and maybe I can arrange with the Engineering dept to give a presentation of the tool/your work if you have some extra time
